bulletPoints.content: Promoted from P30 to P40 Software Engineer in early 2022

Primarily operated as a front-end developer working on Jira's frontend. A React/Webpack mono-repo consisting all of the frontends across the various jira products. My teams focus was in Jira Service Management.
Gained backend experience across Java/Kotlin monoliths and micro-services deployed to AWS infrastructure

children.content: Development of product features and bug fixes
Participation in the incident management process including a 24/7 on-call roster

bulletPoints.content: Promoted to Senior UI Developer in December 2019
Worked on projects for large clients including Hungry Jacks, Supercars, NBN and Sanofi
for building and maintaining web frontends and React Native mobile apps for iOS and Android
Built a large number of websites for clients across Australia ranging from small business to Government, Not-for-profits, Healthcare and Education
experience in building and running WordPress websites and making custom themes
